result.title: Reports on Communication Activities-2
result.description: A report following the evaluation that uses the methodology provided within the dissemination plan (communication strategy chapter) on the basis of KPIs monitoring. The analysis will be made every six months and results will be provided in two reports to be delivered to the EC at M36. A section including unintended and unexpected impacts will be also recorded and registered and associated contingency plans provided.
